title: Hatchy
author: Hatchy
content: my country people una well done. well one sad news wey just dey reach us for forum right now besay one of our member, @ light_warrior just passed away. the news was really heartbreaking, because that guy be ¬†one correct guy for forum and I really appreciate e effort wey e dey pit for forum dat time wey e dey alive. na e be d no 1 plagiarism buster wey I know of since I join Bitcointalk and I actually respected d guy wella. so far, Dem don create thread for am for reputation board and Dem be don drop one donation address to take help fund for e family. I go also like Make we visit that thread and still show small love. even though say you no know this guy, but as long as e be member of Bitcointalk, all of us na family. so make we play our part and show am small love even though say you no drop or donate, just go the thread go show your condolences. link to thread for light_warrior:Light_warrior / Memorial thread ... Ô∏èthis thing really pain me, as even self, when I dey check forum yesterday I con see one old member¬†Becky666 too wey be our Nija person and dem add rip join her account. it was actually sad. the thing be say we must all pass away some day, but our prayers suppose be say make we eat the fruit of our labor before God call us.

comments.author: Samlucky O
comments.body: Rip to them. Death is inevitable no matter how beautiful/handsome we are, or even how educated and smart we are, we can not run away from death. Na wetting baba God don sign am say we must surely die. We the Bitcoin community dey sorry about the loss. may there soul rest in perfect peace. I pray God almighty give them internal rest.

comments.author: Agbamoni
comments.body: My condolences to the family @ light _ warrior. I know how it feels after all this journey and one day we all go meet our maker. This is why we should always love and cherish every moment we have with every member in the forum. We have various reason we came here for and my prayer for us all is that our goal should be fulfilled. On behalf of the Naija bitcoin community we ae as well grieving for the loss of a brother, a mentor, a friend and as well a father. May his humble soul RIP.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: This is unfortunate for this group here. Well life is like that and we pray to God to do our best while we are still having his grace to live and let our dreams be fulfilled. There is always a reason to do good and death is what we can't stop when the time comes.Condolence to the family of our brother.

comments.author: Mayor of ogba
comments.body: RIP to @light_warrior. This light_warrior death dey pain me well well like this o, our sister/brother and a Bitcoiner no dey alive again to see the maximum price way Bitcoin go dey. My condolences to the family of the dead.

comments.author: HajiBagi
comments.body: Quote from: Samlucky O on December 08, 2023, 07:05:35 AMRip to them. Death is inevitable no matter how beautiful/handsome we are, or even how educated and smart we are, we can not run away from death. Na wetting baba God don sign am say we must surely die. We the Bitcoin community dey sorry about the loss. may there soul rest in perfect peace. I pray God almighty give them internal rest.Ameen, may his soul rest in peace, na true you talk my brother death is what every living soul will taste it doesn't concerned maybe you are handsome or ugly, it also don't concerned rich and poor person, no matter how E be we no fit achieve our goals finish for this life, my prayer be say, may God forgive our sins and grant us with better place after our death, and for our senior man wey pass away, anywhere wey him dey now may baba God answer all our prayers and grant him janah.

comments.author: Hewlet
comments.body: This is so sad and it's¬† a huge loss to the forum. Although I don't know him in the forum, maybe because I have not stayed all that long here but from his activity and the strength of his account, he must have been someone that has contributed positively to the growth of the forum.We can only wish his family well and render the necessary support that we can give. This should also send a strong message to us all that no one is coming of of this world alive, we only have a stipulated amount of time to leave after which we exit the world no matter how good, influential, rich or educated that we are.RIP light_warrior.

comments.author: Marvelockg
comments.body: I'm just speechless. death have no respect for any man. See how he has taken a top man from us.It's good that we are showing concern and support for the family he has left behind.May his soul rest in peace.

comments.author: Antotena
comments.body: Rest in peace to this soul. In deed all soul shall taste death. May his soul rest in peace and may the lord comfort the family.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Rest on Light_warrior. Your legacy will forever continue to speak in your absence. It is sad we will miss you.May God grant his family and loved ones the fortitude to bear the loss.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Our life on earth only matters a little compared to where we go in the afterlife. light_warrior has been a helpful member on the forum, although I don't know him too well. I have read some of his posts, which really provided help and guidance to some people too. All I can say is that his soul may find peace in the afterlife. Rest on, man.

comments.author: Makus
comments.body: It's just so painful knowing that someone who was active here in this forum 6days ago is no more, I'm short of words to say but, we'll miss you Mr Light_warrior. The feeling of losing someone precious is just so not acceptable at first, I can't even imagine what the family is going through right now, especially his lovely daughter. Indeed his contribution to this forum was noticeable, proving that he was indeed a legend that would be remembered. RIP Light_warriorOnes again, my condolence to his family.

comments.author: Jamestown70
comments.body: RIP @light_warrior it's so unfortunate we lost a good personality like you from this forum, life is so strange to us as humans the earth is said to be our resting place of which we shall know no pain so i pray you rest in peace it's so sad losing a loved one I pray God give your entire family the fortitude to bear this great pain.

comments.author: Pi-network314159
comments.body: We the Bitcoin community a9ja local board dey sorry for your dismisal. You na somebody wey don add many things to people's life for the forum. Because for this long you don dey here, I no say you don add vallu to many people even say I bearly no you. May God almighty grant you internal life. We miss you somuch. Once again RIP.

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: It is unfortunate such a loss to the Bitcointalk community. You will forever remain in our heart @light_warrior. Our prayers are with the family and loved ones.Rest in Peace¬† @Light_warrior.

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: Nah person wey never lose somebody before, na him no go know wetin e mean to lose a dear one. I can only imagine the pain the family is going through right now and I pray that God Almighty should grant them the fortitude to bear this irreplaceable loss. Adieu light_warriorüïØÔ∏è

comments.author: Richbased
comments.body: What a sad experience that no one will wish to have as this has brought a great loss to the community of Bitcointalk forum, a copper member in that regards. May his gentle sow find eternal rest!

comments.author: Orpichukwu
comments.body: Diz one nah another big lose to the community, this guy I don see am post for one of the forum clean up thread where eh they help dig out people way they use AI and other spammer way they for the forum, death nah just one thing way we really no fit predict most times eh just they come hit person even when the person no ready. Just as him name sound, him go don fight go fight for earth make him soul find peace for where eh they now and make the family take heart, eh no easy but God go help see them through and the community ho extend their support and condolences give the family. May his gentle soul rest in peace.

comments.author: Cityhunter34
comments.body: Please accept My condolences e no dey easy oh death is like a clothes way dey for everybody, because you fit stay with person today tomorrow you go here say the person don die,I pray may god give the family the fortitude to bear the Lost.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: Em d unfortunate sae we lose one of our own in the cold hands of death that we don't know the exact cause of em death. Since we don't and not ready to question God on why one of our own chose to say forever goodbye to all of us without a notice, may his gentle soul continue to rest in the bosom of the Lord till we are able to part no more at the pointed time when all souls will be judged according to their deeds. It's a painful death, and we gats to accept it that no mans lives forever. Death can come knocking at anyone's door at any given time. Na why be sae peso need to live an upright live because you never can't tell wetin go fit come your way unexpected when you are less expect. My condolences na to the family of light warrior, make God give the fortitude to be able to bear the loss of their son, and brother(don't know whether he is married or not) Amen!!!
